
#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
int t,n,i,a[100005],temp;
cin >> t;

while(t--){
	cin >> n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin >> a[i];
	}
	sort(a,a+n);

	for(i=2;i<n;i=i+2){
		temp = a[i];
		a[i] = a[i-1];
		a[i-1] = temp;
	}
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		cout << a[i] << " " ;
	}
	cout << endl;

}


}
